home.title: Wide Network of Stores at Your Service
home.description: As a leading brand in Azerbaijan's market for over 20 years, we offer a high-quality and cost-effective shopping experience to our customers.

network.subtitle: Our Network
network.title: Our Supermarket Network
network.megadescription: The Megastore supermarket chain, which currently operates with 21 stores in the Republic of Azerbaijan, was established in 2010.
network.bolmartdescription: Operating in the Azerbaijani retail market for nearly 20 years, the Bolmart supermarket chain currently serves customers with nearly 50 branches.
network.grandmartdescription: Operating in the Azerbaijani retail market for nearly 20 years, the Grandmart supermarket chain currently serves customers with over 30 branches.
network.novashomedescription: Novas Home started operations in 2019. The brandâ€™s branches are located inside our supermarket stores. In a short time, the Novas Home concept has expanded to new branches.
